isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - INSTALL - Install DOOR LOCK ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: Install DOOR LOCK ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: Door locks and console-mounted key switch are coded the same so that one key will operate all three cylinders. The code number is stamped on the key switch body just in back of the cap nut. The code number does not appear on door the lock assembly.
To REPLACE the door lock, you must replace the complete assembly. The tumbler unit is not removable. If you must replace one door lock, replace both of them with matching locks.
Refer to Figure 78 for Items in parentheses.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

step1.para: Position door lock cylinder assembly (Item 3) into cab door (Item 5) and rotate door cylinder lock assembly to position key slot properly into cab door, driver side shown.
Install lock cylinder retainer clip (Item 4) into door lock cylinder assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.
Install lock control rod (Item 2) into door lock cylinder assembly (Item 3) and slide retaining clip (Item 1) onto lock control rod, driver side shown.

svcproc.para: If installing DRIVER SIDE DOOR LOCK ASSEMBLY follow Steps 4 and 5 below.

step1.para:
Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

svcproc.para: If installing PASSENGER SIDE DOOR LOCK ASSEMBLY follow Steps 6 and 7 below.

step1.para:
Install upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly onto cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Install Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.

Install cab door lower trim panel onto cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Install Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.
